home.title: TOZEUR
home.subtitle: Experience the magic of desert running in the heart of Tunisia. Join thousands of runners for an unforgettable journey through ancient oases and stunning landscapes.

unique.title: Unique Desert Experience
unique.description: Run through palm groves, salt lakes, and stunning Saharan landscapes

professional.title: Professional Organization
professional.description: IAAF certified course with international timing and safety standards

community.title: Global Community
community.description: Join runners from 30+ countries in this unforgettable adventure

cultural.title: Cultural Immersion
cultural.description: Discover the rich heritage of Tozeur before and after the race

footer.aboutText: Tozeur Marathon is Tunisia's premier desert running event, bringing together runners from around the world.
